scripts.buildCalculator: node cli.js build-all calculator release calculator.proto && node cli.js run-tests calculator
scripts.buildChat: node cli.js build-all chat release chat.proto
scripts.buildControlledContractUpdate: node cli.js build-all --generate_authorize controlled_contract_update release update.proto
scripts.buildImmutable: node cli.js build-all immutable release immutable.proto
scripts.buildNft: node cli.js build-all nft release nft.proto
scripts.buildStaking: node cli.js build-all staking release staking.proto
scripts.buildToken: node cli.js build-all token release token.proto && node cli.js run-tests token
scripts.buildTransactionStorage: node cli.js build transaction_storage release && node cli.js run-tests transaction_storage
scripts.buildAll: yarn lint && yarn buildCalculator && yarn buildChat && yarn buildControlledContractUpdate && yarn buildImmutable && yarn buildNft && yarn buildStaking && yarn buildToken && yarn buildTransactionStorage
